data.name: InvalidDatabaseName
data.value: Invalid database name "{0}". Database names may only contain letters, digits, and underscores.
data.comment: {0} = database name supplied by user

data.name: InvalidDatabaseServerName
data.value: Invalid database server name "{0}". Server names may only contain letters, digits, and underscores.
data.comment: {0} = server name supplied by user

data.name: AppError
data.comment: {0} = error text

data.name: CreateDatabaseException
data.value:
An exception occurred while creating a database:
{0}
data.comment: {0} = exception message

data.name: DeleteDatabaseException
data.value:
An exception occurred while deleting a database:
{0}
data.comment: {0} = exception message

data.name: SeriousErrorInEventLog
data.value: A serious error occurred. Please contact your system administrator. More information has been written to the server event log.

data.name: SlkEventLogSource
data.comment: used in Source column om Event Viewer if "SharePoint Learning Kit" event source is enabled

data.name: WssEventLogSource
data.comment: must be what appears in the Source column of Event Viewer for SharePoint event log entries

data.name: SharePoint2010LogSource
data.comment: must be what appears in the Source column of Event Viewer for SharePoint event log entries. Possible doesn't need to be localised

data.name: NotSharePointAdmin
data.value: Current user is not a SharePoint administrator

data.name: DefaultSlkDatabaseName
data.comment: This is the default SLK database name

data.name: DefaultSlkInstructorPermissionName
data.comment: This is the default name of the SharePoint permission which identifies instructors

data.name: DefaultSlkLearnerPermissionName
data.comment: This is the default name of the SharePoint permission which identifies learners

data.name: SlkInstructorPermissionDescription
data.value: Can use SharePoint Learning Kit features to assign e-learning content to learners.
data.comment: When the "SLK Instructor" permission is created, this is its description.

data.name: SlkLearnerPermissionDescription
data.value: Appears as a potential learner when new assignments are created using SharePoint Learning Kit.
data.comment: When the "SLK Learner" permission is created, this is its description.

data.name: SlkSettingsFileError
data.value: Problem found in SLK Settings file: {0}
data.comment: {0} = exception message

data.name: AdminGenericException
data.value:
{0}
More information has been written to the server event log.
data.comment: {0} = exception message

data.name: SlkNotEnabled
data.value: This site is not configured to use SharePoint Learning Kit. Administrators can use SharePoint Central Administration to configure SharePoint Learning Kit.

data.name: SlkSettingsNotFound
data.value: SharePoint Learning Kit is not configured correctly -- please contact your system administrator. (SLK Settings not found for SPSite GUID {0}.)
data.comment: {0} = SPSite GUID

data.name: AlwpWepPartTitle
data.comment: Title for Assignment List Wep Part

data.name: AlwpWepPartDescription
data.value: Use this web part to keep track of your SharePoint Learning Kit assignments.
data.comment: Description for Assignment List Wep Part

data.name: SlkExUserNotFound
data.value: You must sign in to use SharePoint Learning Kit.
data.comment: Occurs if Current user not signed in.

data.name: AlwpQuerySetNotFound
data.value: The query or query set, {0}, does not exist. Open the tool pane to specify a different query set override or remove the entry to use the default query set.

data.name: CtrlLabelAssignmentPropDesc
data.value: Enter the title and description of the assignment, start and due dates, and the number of points possible for the assignment. You can also specify whether learner assignments will automatically be returned, and whether learners can see the correct answers when they review the assignment.

data.name: ActionsItemNotFound
data.value: The learning resource does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.

data.name: ActionslblAssignSelf
data.value: The assignment will appear with all your other assignments.

data.name: ActionslblChoose
data.value: Choose the site where you'd like to assign this learning resource:

data.name: ActionslblMRUAddress
data.value: Type the address of the SharePoint site you'd like to add.

data.name: ActionslblWhatHeader
data.value: What would you like to do with this document?

data.name: ActionslnkAssignSelf
data.value: Assign this learning resource to yourself.

data.name: ActionslnkMRUAddSite
data.value: Add a site to this list...

data.name: ActionsPageDescriptionNoFile
data.value: This page allows you to choose which site to assign a piece of work to.

data.name: ActionsPageDescription
data.value: This page allows you to use a document for e-learning. You can assign the document to yourself or to someone else. When you assign a document to someone else, you can specify a SharePoint site where the assignment will appear, and choose members of that site to be instructors or learners.

data.name: LobbyDeleteMessage
data.value: Deleting an assignment will delete all the associated learner data, including learner work and grades for the assignment. You cannot recover deleted information. Click OK to delete the assignment.
data.comment: Cannot contain single quotes, double quotes, or back slashes.

data.name: LobbyDeleteToolTip
data.value: Delete this assignment and all learner work (Alt+X)

data.name: LobbylblAutoReturn
data.value: The assignment will be returned to the learner automatically.

data.name: LobbyMarkasCompleteMessage
data.value: Once you mark an assignment as complete, you will no longer be able to work on it.
data.comment: Cannot contain single quotes, double quotes, or back slashes.

data.name: LobbyPageDescription
data.value: Use this page to complete and submit your assignment.

data.name: LobbyReviewAssignmentToolTipCompleted
data.value: You cannot review the assignment until it has been returned.

data.name: LobbySubmitMessage
data.value: Submitting an assignment will send it to the instructor. Once it is submitted, you will no longer be able to work on it.
data.comment: Cannot contain single quotes, double quotes, or back slashes.

data.name: AppDescMaxLengthError
data.value: The description exceeds the maximum length of 4096 characters.
data.comment: App description Max Length error message.

data.name: AppTitleMaxLengthError
data.value: The title exceeds the maximum length of 1000 characters.
data.comment: App Title Max Length error message.

data.name: ActionsWarning
data.value: Some errors in this learning resource were repaired, but the learning resource may not function as expected.

data.name: ErrorBannerValidationWarning
data.value: There are one or more problems on this page. Additional information is displayed in each section with a problem.
data.comment: Warning Message Displayed in the Error Banner.

data.name: AppDueDateError
data.value: The due date must be later than the start date.
data.comment: App Due date : If non blank and Due date < Start Date Error

data.name: ActionsItemIsFolder
data.value: You cannot assign a folder. To assign all the contents of a folder, you must package its contents into a single archive file.

data.name: SlkExQueryStringFormatError
data.value: The value ({0}) is not valid for the {1} parameter.
data.comment: Generic Query String Error If Query String is not in write format.

data.name: SlkExQueryStringNotFound
data.value: The {0} parameter is missing or empty.
data.comment: Generic Query String Error If Query String is Missing.

data.name: AppInstructorPermissonNotFound
data.value: You cannot assign to this site because you are not an instructor.
data.comment: Error Message if User doesn’t have instructor permission on the SPWeb.

data.name: AppSPWebNotEnabled
data.value: The site {0} has not been enabled for e-learning.
data.comment: {0} SPWeb.Title . SPWeb is not part of an SLK-enabled SPSite

data.name: SlkSiteNotFound
data.value: The site {0} does not exist or is not a valid SharePoint site.
data.comment: {0} SPWeb.Title . if Site doesn’t exist, or is not a SharePoint SPWeb.

data.name: AppInstructorRequiredError
data.value: The assignment must have at least one instructor.
data.comment: Instructor Required.

data.name: AppLearnersRequiredError
data.value: The assignment must be assigned to at least one learner.
data.comment: Learners Required.

data.name: SlkNotValidDate
data.value: You must specify a valid date within the range of 1/1/1900 and 12/31/8900.
data.comment: Standare Error Message for invalid Date.

data.name: GradingDeleteToolTip
data.value: Delete this assignment and all learner work (Alt+X)

data.name: GradingEditToolTip
data.value: Edit properties of the assignment, or change instructors or learners (Alt+I)

data.name: GradingPageDescription
data.value: Use this page to grade assignments you've assigned. You can also edit an assignment's properties to change its description, due dates, who it's assigned to, etc.

data.name: GradingCollectMessage
data.value: Collecting assignments will prevent learners from continuing to work on them.

data.name: GradingDeleteMessage
data.value: Deleting an assignment will delete all the associated learner data, including learner work and grades for the assignment. You cannot recover deleted information.

data.name: GradingReturnMessage
data.value: All learner assignments will be returned to the learners. If you have not graded all the assignments, some learners may receive zero points.

data.name: GradinglblAnswers
data.value: Correct answers are shown to the learner when the assignment is returned (Class Server content only).

data.name: GradinglblAutoReturn
data.value: The assignment will be returned to the learner automatically.

data.name: GradinglblGradeAssignmentDescription
data.value: Enter grades and comments for individual learners. When you're done, click Save or OK. To exit without saving, click Cancel.

data.value: Test this link (opens in new window)

data.value: If you clear this check box, any work completed on the assignment by this learner or group will be permanently deleted.
data.comment: Confirmation Message when Learners/Group checkbox unchecked. Do not use double quotes or backslashes.

data.name: ActionsNotInstructor
data.value: You cannot assign to the site ({0}) because you are not an instructor on that site.

data.name: AppConfirmUnCheckCurrentUser
data.value: If you uncheck yourself you will no longer be able to grade this assignment, or have access to this assignment’s properties.
data.comment: Confirmation Message displayed If the current user is unchecked. Do not use double quotes or backslashes.

data.comment: Specifies {0} = WebPart Title, {1} = Description.

data.comment: {0} is points

data.name: GradingActionFinalToolTip
data.value: Allows the learner to re-do the assignment.
data.comment: Tool Tip for the Action Checkbox control if Learner Assignment State is Final in Grading list.

data.name: GradingActionNotSubmittedToolTip
data.value: Prevents the learner from continuing to work on the assignment, and allows you to grade it
data.comment: Tool Tip for the Action Checkbox control if Learner Assignment State is Not Started or In Progress in Grading list.

data.name: GradingActionSubmittedToolTip
data.value: Returns the assignment to the learner for review
data.comment: Tool Tip for the Action Checkbox control if Learner Assignment State is Submitted in Grading list.

data.name: GradingActionTextFinal
data.comment: Text for the Action Checkbox Label control if Learner Assignment State is Final in Grading list.

data.name: GradingActionTextNotSubmitted
data.comment: Text for the Action Checkbox Label control if Learner Assignment State is Not Started or In Progress in Grading list.

data.comment: Text for the Action Checkbox Label control if Learner Assignment State is Submitted in Grading list.

data.name: GradingFinalScoreNotSubmittedToolTip

data.comment: Tool Tip for the FinalScore control if Learner Assignment State is Not Started or In Progress in Grading list.

data.name: GradingFinalScoreSubmittedToolTip

data.comment: Tool Tip for the FinalScore control if Learner Assignment State is Submitted or Final in Grading list.

data.value: The score must be a number.
data.comment: Alert message if Final Score in Grading is non-blank and not a number.

data.name: GradingConfirmOverrideFinalPoints
data.value: You previously cleared the final score for this learner. Click OK to overwrite the blank score with the new score of {0}. Click Cancel to leave the final score blank.
data.comment: Confirmation Message Displayed When Override the Final Score as it is Graded Now. {0} represents <graded score>.

data.name: GradingReactivateMessage
data.value: Reactivating this assignment erases any scoring changes made by instructors and returns the assignment to the learner to complete again.

data.name: LobbyInvalidLearnerAssignmentId
data.value: The learner assignment (ID {0}) does not exist or you may not have permission to access it.

data.name: LobbyInvalidSite
data.value: This Web site is not accessible.

data.name: AppNavigateToDocLib
data.comment: {0} Doclib Name. App navigates to the folder in the doclib where the content was assigned from.

data.name: ActionsCheckedOutError
data.value: You cannot assign the learning resource because it is currently checked out to you. You must check it in before assigning it.

data.name: ActionsDraftVersion
data.value: The learning resource is a draft. If you assign it, learners may lose access to it once it is published or approved.

data.name: LobbyWindowAlreadyOpen
data.value: This assignment is already open in another window.

data.name: SlkUtilitiesCannotSortColumnType
data.value: Cannot sort on a column of type: {0}

data.name: SlkUtilitiesColumnNotDefined
data.value: Column "{0}" not defined in LearningStore view "{1}"

data.name: SlkUtilitiesConditionException
data.value: At most one of the attributes "Value" or "MacroName" may be provided, and neither may be provided if "Operator" is "IsNull" or "IsNotNull"; "MacroName" must be provided if "NoConditionOnNull" is "true"

data.name: SlkUtilitiesMacroNameNotProvided
data.value: if noConditionOnNull is true, macroName must be provided

data.name: SlkUtilitiesOneValueNonNull
data.value: at most one of value and macroName arguments can be non-null

data.comment: value to display when there are no points possible and no points

data.name: SlkUtilitiesPointsNoValuePointsPossible
data.comment: {0} is points possible

data.comment: {0} is points

data.name: SlkUtilitiesPointsValuePointsPossible
data.comment: {0} is points and {1} is points possible

data.value: Query set name cannot be the same as a query name: {0}

data.name: SlkUtilitiesSettingsException
data.comment: {0} is the line number. {1} is the message

data.name: SlkUtilitiesSubmitted
data.comment: {0} is completed or submitted assignments. {1} is total assignments.

data.name: SlkUtilitiesValueNullifIsNotNull
data.value: value and macroName arguments must be null if oper is "IsNotNull"

data.name: SlkUtilitiesValueNullifIsNull
data.value: value and macroName arguments must be null if oper is "IsNull"

data.name: SlkExInstructorPermissonNotFound
data.value: You cannot perform this operation because you are not an instructor on this site ({0}).
data.comment: Error Message if User doesn’t have instructor permission on the SPWeb.

data.name: LearnerAssignmentTransitionNotSupported
data.value: Requested learner assignment state transition is not supported

data.name: ConfigureDescription
data.value: Use this page to configure SharePoint Learning Kit (SLK) for one or more Site Collections.

data.name: ConfigureImagePleaseWait
data.value: Please wait while your changes are processed.

data.name: ConfigureLabelPleaseWait
data.value: Please wait while your changes are processed.

data.name: ConfigureInputSiteSelectorDescription
data.value: Select a Site Collection to configure.

data.name: AppNotAnInstructorInCurrentSiteError
data.value: The available learners and instructors for this site could not be displayed because you are not an instructor on the site.

data.name: ConfigureLabelDatabaseDescriptionText
data.value:
Specify the SLK database that will contain e-learning assignments for the selected site collection.

  • Multiple site collections can share the same SLK database. To use an existing SLK database, enter the server and database name.
  • To create a new database, enter an existing database server and a new database name, and select Create a new database.

data.name: ConfigureLabelPermissionsDescriptionText
data.value:
Specify the SharePoint permissions that will identify instructors and learners in SLK.

  • To use existing SharePoint permissions to identify instructors and learners, enter the permission names; for example, "Contribute" and "Read".
  • To create new permissions, enter the permission names and select Create permissions.

Recommended  Create "SLK Instructor" and "SLK Learner" permissions for new installations.

data.name: ConfigureLabelSlkSettingDescriptionText
data.value: Optionally, upload a new SLK Settings XML file. This XML file specifies the queries that are available within Assignment List Web Part, as well as other settings.

data.name: ConfigureLinkCurrentSettingsFileText
data.value: Click here to download the current SLK Settings file

data.name: ConfigureLinkDefaultSettingsFileText
data.value: Click here to download the default SLK Settings file used in new installations

data.name: APPInvalidSite
data.value: This Web site is not accessible.
data.comment: Set the Web Site Title to not accesible in APP when user does not have access to it.

data.name: SlkExAlwpSqlDeadLockError
data.value: The server is currently busy. Please refresh your browser.
data.comment: When Alwp becomes victom of dead lock displays this specific message suggesting the user to refresh the browser.

data.name: SlkExWorkFlowSqlDeadLockError
data.value: The server is currently busy. Please retry your operation.
data.comment: When work flow pages become victom of dead lock displays this specific message suggesting the user try the operation again.

data.name: DefaultSlkObserverPermissionName
data.comment: This is the default name of the Sharepoint permission which identifies observers

data.name: ObserverRoleCommunicationInterfaceTitle
data.comment: This string is used as the menu label in the communication interface between ALWP and the 3rd party web part.

data.name: SlkObserverPermissionDescription
data.value: Appears as a potential observer when new assignments are created using the SharePoint Learning Kit
data.comment: 'SLK Observer' permission is created with this description

data.name: SessionNotConfigured
data.value: To use the observor role session state must be enabled for the web application.
data.comment: Tried to use observor role without setting session state up.

data.name: SubmittedFilesPageDescription
data.value: Use this page to view the assignment submitted files.

data.name: SubmittedFilesInstructorMessage
data.value: Click here to view all files submitted by {0} for this assignment.

data.name: SubmittedFilesLearnerNoAccessException
data.value: You don't have access to this page because the assignment is still not returned by the instructor.

data.name: SubmittedFilesTeacherNoAccessException
data.value: You don't have access to this page because the assignment is still not submitted by the student.

data.name: LobbyReviewSubmittedToolTip
data.value: View assignment submitted files updated with instructor(s) comments.

data.name: SubmittedFilesNoAssignmentFilesException
data.value: No files were found for this assignment.

data.name: SubmittedFilesNoAssignmentFolderException
data.value: No folder was found for this assignment.

data.name: SubmittedFilesNoAssignmentSubFolderException
data.value: No sub folder was found for this assignment for the given student name.

data.name: ConfigurelabelDropBoxFilesExtensionsDescriptionText
data.value: Specify the allowed Drop Box file extension types... (Example: doc;docx;xls)

data.name: AssFolderAlreadyExists
data.value: An assignment folder with the same name already exists

data.name: AssFolderNotFound
data.value: No folder was found for this assignment

data.name: DropBoxInstructorsDescription
data.value: Can only view and open list items.

data.name: DropBoxLearnersDescription
data.value: Can only view , open and add list items.

data.name: SubFolderNotFound
data.value: No sub folder was found for this assignment for the given student name

data.name: GradingDownloadToolTip
data.value: Download a zipped file for all students' submissions for this assignment

data.name: GradingUploadToolTip
data.value: Upload the assignment back with comments

data.name: CommentedFilesAssignmnetsNotCompleted
data.value: One or more learners did not complete the assignment yet

data.name: CommentedFilesExtractFileException
data.value: An error occurred while trying to extract the uploaded file.

data.name: CommentedFilesNoAccessException
data.value: You do not have access to this page because you are not an instructor

data.name: CommentedFilesPageDescription
data.value: Use this page to upload the assignment commented files.

data.name: GradingNotAllLearnersSubmitted
data.value: One or more learners did not complete the assignment yet

data.name: AssignmentNameAlreadyUsed
data.value: This name is already used for another assignment.

data.name: LobbySubmitFilesToolTip
data.value: Submit your solution for this assignment.

data.name: FilesUploadDocumentUploadDescription
data.value: Browse to the document you intend to upload.

data.name: CommentedFilesNoAssignmentFolderException
data.value: assignment folder does not exist under Drop Box Document Library.

data.name: CommentedFilesExtractionFailed
data.value: No commented files were uploaded, please check the zip file.

data.name: CommentedFilesNoFilesUploaded
data.value: No commented files were uploaded to

data.name: FilesUploadAssFolderUnavailableErr
data.value: The assignment folder is unavailable. Try again later, if the problem persists contact the system administrator.

data.name: FilesUploadAssInaccessible
data.value: Once the assignment is submitted to the instructor, it will not be accessible.

data.name: FilesUploadAssIsInaccessible
data.value: The assignment has been submitted to the instructor and is not accessible.

data.name: DropBoxUnavailableError
data.value: Currently the Drop Box is unavailable. Try again later, if the problem persists contact the system administrator.

data.name: FilesUploadInvalidExtensions
data.value: One or more of the files you are trying to upload has an disallowed file extension. Permitted file extensions are {0}.

data.name: FilesUploadNoLearnerFolder
data.value: Your learner folder does not exist, please contact your instructor.

data.name: FilesUploadOrCancel
data.value: At least one file should be uploaded to submit the assignment.If you are not ready yet to submit the assignment click Cancel.

data.name: FilesSubmissionResultLblMsg
data.value: The Assignment file(s) submission was completed successfully.

data.name: FilesUploadPageSuccessMsg
data.value: The Assignment file(s) submission was completed successfully.

data.name: FilesUploadPageFailureMessage
data.value: Failed to upload files [{0}]. Invalid extensions.

data.name: DropBoxManagerNoRole
data.value: Cannot find role {0}. This is required to set Drop Box permissions.

data.name: InvalidNewAssignment
data.value: You must set the location of an assignment before creating one.

data.value: Only the learner can submit the assignment.

data.value: Assignment cannot be submitted as it is not yet started.

data.value: Assignment cannot be reactivated as it is still active.

data.value: Assignment cannot be collected as it is not yet started.

data.name: ReactivateAssignmentNotStarted
data.value: Assignment cannot be reactivated as it is not yet started.

data.value: Assignment cannot be returned as it is still active.
